solution_line_template: Tommy ordered {apples_kg} + {grapes_kg} + {oranges_kg} = <<{apples_kg}+{grapes_kg}+{oranges_kg}={other_fruits_total_kg}>>{other_fruits_total_kg} kilograms of apples, oranges and grapes altogether.
Therefore, Tommy ordered {total_weight_ordered_kg} - {other_fruits_total_kg} = <<{total_weight_ordered_kg}-{other_fruits_total_kg}={strawberries_kg}>>{strawberries_kg} kilograms of strawberries.
